title: Triumph Speed T4 launched: Superbike maker unveils its most affordable bike at Rs 2.17 lakh. Check features, Specs
description: Triumph India has introduced the Speed T4 at Rs 2.17 lakh, making it the most affordable Triumph bike in the country. Available in white, red, and black, it succeeds the Speed 400 with new color schemes and conventional telescopic forks. The bike features a 399cc engine producing 30.6bhp and includes an all-LED display with Bluetooth connectivity.
